autarc (YC S24) - Full Stack Engineer - Germany - Hybrid - Full Time

We're looking for a senior full-stack software engineer based in Germany who wants to directly tackle climate change by building a local-first React/CapacitorJS/TypeScript/RxDB/Supabase app.

We're autarc (YC S24) the B2B operating system for energy installers in Europe. Our mission is to accelerate the installation of heat pumps and solar panels, directly contributing to the clean energy and heating transition.

Our app has some pretty cool features such as a LiDAR scan to collect data about rooms, an AR heat pump simulation, or real time heat load calculations that function entirely offline.
